nodes.name: RoninDojo
nodes.description: They help people to have a feature rich bitcoin experience, maintain privacy, and thrive as a sovereign individual.

nodes.name: Raspibolt
nodes.description: Build your own do-everything-yourself Bitcoin full node that will make you a sovereign peer in the Bitcoin and Lightning network.

nodes.name: Citadel
nodes.description: Citadel allows you to run a Bitcoin Lightning node or a personal server on a Raspberry Pi

nodes.name: myNode
nodes.description: myNode aims to be the easiest way to run a dedicated, easy to use, Bitcoin Node and Lightning Wallet! By combining the best open source software with our UI, management, and monitoring software, you can easily, safely, and securely use Bitcoin and Lightning

nodes.name: Sensei
nodes.description: Sensei is a lightning node implementation focused on making Bitcoin accessible to the entire world

nodes.name: Voltage
nodes.description: Bitcoin infrastructure made easy. Voltage offers enterprise-grade infrastructure services for Bitcoin. Build, deploy, and scale faster with Voltage

nodes.name: Start9Labs
nodes.description: The era of sovereign computing. Anyone can do it. No one can stop it

nodes.name: Bitnodes
nodes.description: Bitnodes estimates the relative size of the Bitcoin peer-to-peer network by finding all of its reachable nodes

nodes.name: Pruned Node Today
nodes.description: Get your pruned Bitcoin Core node in 5 minutes

nodes.name: Minibolt
nodes.description: With this guide, you can set up a Bitcoin and Lightning node from scratch, doing everything yourself
